Posts.Content: Has anyone heard about FRANKINCENSE ( essential oil ) for treating Prostate Cancer ? Was diagnosed with stage 1 last year. Recent PSA 7 plus (new high) Recent CAT scan revealed a large stone,a cyst and lesion in the Kidney! They are going to take a look next week. I should just be in the hospital one day ( in and out ) Then I will know more !
Posts.Title: ocman

Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply! My Dr. told me with my age 69 1/2 with high blood pressure , cholesterol and Asthma! that I was TOO OLD for removal !!
Posts.Title: ocman

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by ASAdvocate Stage 1 prostate cancer should usually not require radical treatment. But, your testing should tell you if there is additional cancer not found previously. Are you eligible for radiation? The cure rates are at least equal to surgery. There are many chemicals, plants, and potions being touted as cancer cures. Some people claim they have helped them, but, if that were universally true, oncology would cease to be needed, and I doubt that is going to happen. Thanks for replying! Second Bio in two weeks ! Do you know about proton therapy as apposed to radiation ??
Posts.Title: ocman
